Package index

Data Import

Functions to import MiteMap data from various sources

import_mitemap()
Import MiteMapTools data
import_mitemap_from_multiple_folder()
Import mitemap from multiple folders

Data Processing

Functions to filter and clean tracking data

filter_mitemap()
Filter (clean) MiteMap result
summarize_mitemap()
Summarize MiteMap data at the individual (File) level

Visualization

Functions to create plots and visualizations

plot_ind_mitemap()
Plot individual map
vioplot_mitemap()
Make violin plot of MiteMap data
extract_heatmap()
Create folder(s) with heatmaps extracted from zip files optionally organized by a factor

Statistical Analysis

Functions for behavioral analysis and statistics

binom_test_mitemap()
Test binomial on MiteMap for presence in the half part of the odor
convex_hull_mitemap()
Map convex hull on MiteMap

Example Data

Sample datasets included with the package

MM_data
example dataset from MiteMapTools

Utilities

Helper functions and utilities

get_file_extension()
Get the extension of a file
MiteMapTools-package MiteMapTools
MiteMapTools: A toolkit for analyzing arthropod movement data
rename_files_with_number()
Rename files with number inside a folder
